name: League of Evil
description: League of Evil is an action game where you, as a bionic super agent take on the mission to defeat the League of Evil. Use your acrobatic skills to punch your way through levels filled with deadly traps and defeat your enemies. The world is counting on you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT (256 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 128 MB available space Additional Notes: We recommend play it with gamepad
